doc:
Amelita Ward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Amelita_Ward 0 Amelita Ward (1923–1987) was an American film actress. She played supporting roles in over 20 films between 1943 and 1949, generally in B Pictures such as Gangway for Tomorrow and The Falcon in Danger (1943). She was sometimes credited as Lita Ward. Amelita_Ward ( 1923 – 1987 ) was an_American_film_actress . She played_supporting roles in over_20_films between 1943_and_1949 , generally in B_Pictures such_as Gangway for Tomorrow and The_Falcon in Danger_(_1943_) . She was_sometimes_credited as Lita_Ward .
